issue.title: [C++] Add JSON chunker benchmarks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4701](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4701). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The JSON chunker is not currently benchmarked or tested, but it is a necessary component of a multithreaded reader.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4701?focusedCommentId=16793122) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Moving this to 0.14 since there's more work holistically needed in the JSON reader
